articles.title: 35 Random Products That Will Make You Think “Oh, That Needs To Come Home With Me At Once” - BuzzFeed

articles.title: Amazon will sell you a 65-inch LG C5 OLED for nearly 50% off right now - here's the best deal - ZDNET
articles.description: The LG C5 is one of our favorite picks for the best OLED TVs you can buy, and right now at Amazon, you can snag the 65-inch model for less than $1,500.

articles.title: Samsung will give you a free 65-inch TV right now - here's how to qualify for the deal - ZDNET
articles.description: For a limited time, when you buy a 98-inch QN90F or 100-inch QN80F from Samsung, you'll get a free 65-inch Crystal UHD U8000F.

articles.title: Apple Preparing iOS 18.7 for iPhones as iOS 26 Release Date Nears - MacRumors
